sections.heading: birth certificate; hearing; notice; witnesses
sections.text: The court shall fix a time and place for a hearing upon a petition filed under section 71-617.08 and shall give the department ten calendar days' notice of such hearing. Authorized representatives of the department may appear and testify in the proceedin

71-617.10.Delayed birth certificate; hearing; notice; witnesses.

The court shall fix a time and place for a hearing upon a petition filed under section 71-617.08 and shall give the department ten calendar days' notice of such hearing. Authorized representatives of the department may appear and testify in the proceeding.

SourceLaws 1985, LB 42, ยง 17;Laws 1996, LB 1044, ยง 534;Laws 1997, LB 307, ยง 149;Laws 2007, LB296, ยง 424.
